titleInfo.title: Letter no.37 of 1825 to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from Major Robert Taylor, Political Agent at Basra

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing a pr√©cis of foreign and domestic intelligence from Baghdad for the period 15 to 29 July 1825. The intelligence includes Russian demands made on Persia, and Russian military advances.
